channel.title: Computer freezes 10 seconds after boot
channel.description:
[s]Hi,
After trying to install drivers for the ethernet card built into my laptop, it has recently begun freezing about 10 seconds after boot. Sometimes I can get to the safe mode menu, or into the bios, but it always freezes and shuts off after a few seconds. Is there any way I could fix this? It is an HP NC6230.
Thanks, Justis[/s] Might have been fixed... testing it now.

item.title: Computer freezes 10 seconds after boot
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Different computer
I finally fixed it by formatting the hard drive, which I was planning to do anyways. Stupid broken ethernet drivers…

Read full topic
